project1.name: Line follwing robotic car
project1.description: A line follower car is a robot that follows a visible line on a surface, typically a black line on a white background

project2.name: Web Scraping Program
project2.description: Web scraping is the process of automatically extracting data from a website. You use a program called a web scraper to access a web page, interpret the data,extract what you need

project3.name: Weather Program
project3.description: A weather program is a software application that provides weather-related information to users. It typically includes features such as data fetching.

project4.name: Snake game
project4.description: Snake is a genre of action video games where the player maneuvers the end of a growing line, often themed as a snake

project5.name: Tesla Coil
project5.description: A Tesla coil is an electrical resonant transformer circuit designed by inventor Nikola Tesla in 1891, we tried this as project

project6.name: The Stay PG
project6.description: A simple project for the PG owner to manage the in and out, joining and leaving and for managing the finance for the PG caretaker.
